short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Backup your favorite AMVs to AMV.Art with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In the first screenshot you can see that this extension adds button right next to subscribe button. When you click it it will send AMV to amv.art, it make take some time, like a minute, because we backup AMV on our server. And after AMV is uploaded, this extension will redirect you to our website where this AMV from now on will be stored.
